problem:
set_option linter.unusedVariables false

inductive Tree : Type
| leaf : Tree
| node (l : Tree) (v : Int) (r : Tree) : Tree

open Tree

-- 定义 treeReverse 函数
def treeReverse : Tree → Tree
| leaf => leaf
| node l v r => node (treeReverse r) v (treeReverse l)

-- 定义自定义的最大值函数
def myMax (a b : Int) : Int :=
  if a ≥ b then a else b

-- 定义 myMax 的交换律
theorem myMax_comm (a b : Int) : myMax a b = myMax b a := by
  sorry

-- 定义 treeHeight 函数
def treeHeight : Tree → Int
| leaf => 0
| node l v r => myMax (treeHeight l) (treeHeight r) + 1

-- 定义一个定理，用于证明翻转后的树和原树的高度相同
theorem reverseHeight (t : Tree) : treeHeight (treeReverse t) = treeHeight t := by
